text: Visvasa gara yiniharumadhye e'uta samuha yasto pani cha jasale ki kitaba padhada aphno jibro batarera padhcha, taki timila'i abhasa hos ki yiniharule utari'eko kitaba padhi raheka chan, tara vastavama tyo kitababata humdaina, ra bhanne gardachan ki tyo allahabata utari'eko ho tara tyo allahabata utari'eko haina, ra tiniharule allahako virodhama janajani asatya boldachan
